title: San Onofre Parks Foundation - 2016 TCT Global Champs | Volcom Surf
description:
Steve Long, advisor to San Onofre Parks Foundation has been fortunate enough to spend 34 years working at San Onofre State Beach which includes the world famous Trestles beach. Standing as the last natural watershed in Southern California, Trestles is a prized location for surfers around the world. This beautiful piece of nature for everyone to enjoy is located in the little surf town of San Clemente, California. Learn more about the San Onofre Parks Foundation and what they're up to and remember to stay True To Trestles!

2016 TCT Global Champs @ Lower Trestles, June 14-17 features the world's best 20 & Under surfers battling it out for a $30,000 prize purse and the ultimate title of a TCT Global Champion

asset.title: San Onofre Parks Foundation - 2016 TCT Global Champs | Volcom Surf
asset.description:
2016 TCT Global Champs @ Lower Trestles, June 14-17 features the world's best 20 & Under surfers battling it out for a $30,000 prize purse and the ultimate title of a TCT Global Champion!

Watch the live webcast on June 16-17 at http://tct.volcom.com
asset.author: Volcom

transcripts: You can say I've been true to trestles since the late 1960's when I began sneaking into catch the fabled waves here. My name is Steve Long and I have been fortunate to spend 34 years working here at San Onofre state beach the trestles surf break is at the mouth of the San Mateo creek this is the last natural watershed in Southern California. When you come to trestles respect the place, do tread lightly, pack your trash out. Become informed this is a special place that we all have to stake in, I invite all of these surfers stay true to trestles, too important for us to ever lose, we want our kids to be able to enjoy this, thanks.
